issue.title: [CF 650] Config.lua line 47: attempt to index local 'Module' (a nil value)

> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #650 | Raw

comments.body:
First error is strange. Just fixed it in the code, but note to self: I want to test this when I get home.

Second error is the evil Ace3 bug when deleting groups. I still don't know what is causing it, but at least it shouldn't actually be breaking anything.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
